title: Identify Key Questions
text: To determine the necessary data, start by asking key questions related to the decision you need to make. This will guide you in identifying relevant data.

title: Consider Data Sources
text: Think about where you can obtain the data. Consider both internal and external sources that might provide the information you need.

title: Evaluate Data Relevance
text: Assess whether the data you have is directly related to the decision-making process. Only relevant data should be considered.

title: Ask Fundamental Questions
text: To identify the data required, ask fundamental questions about the decision. This helps in pinpointing the exact data needed.
